title-group.article-title: CONVERGENCE OF CHORIN-MARSDEN FORMULA FOR THE NAVIER-STOKES EQUATIONS ON CONVEX DOMAINS

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: We prove the convergence of the Chorin-Marsden product formula for solving the initial-boundary value problems of the Navier-Stokes equations on convex domains. As a particular case we consider the case of the half plane.
